content:
note this is done in hairpin lace on a 4 inch 3 inch and 2 inch hairpin staples **materials ** * american thread company dawn bulky yarn
7 oz buttercup for 15 inch length cape
8 oz buttercup for 19 inch length cape * puritan star spangled mercerized crochet cotton article 40 2 balls gold spangle or colors of your choice * 1 - 4 inch hairpin lace staple * 1 - 3 inch hairpin lace staple * 1 - 2 inch hairpin lace staple * plastic crochet hook size f steel crochet hook no 7 2 hooks and eyes
